http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/SSD/00061405/AWP 2011 Global Fund Round 7_Improving and Expanding TB.pdf

donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr:
The programme is aimed at strengthening expanded access to tuberculosis control in South Sudan through:
1. High quality DOTS expansion and enhancement
2. Improved monitoring and evaluation through human resource development and technical assistance
3. National TB programme within the Ministry established and sustained

project_descr: Improving and Expanding Tuberculosis Control in S.Sudan
project_title: Improving and Expanding Tuberculosis Control in S.Sudan
